meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of January 14, 2025 Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Briefing on police staffing levels
agenda_items.description: Recommendation to revise staffing goals to increase new police officers from 250 to 400 for fiscal year 2024-2025.

agenda_items.title: Overview of Police and Fire Recruiting and Retention
agenda_items.description: Discussion on recruitment and retention strategies for police and fire departments.

agenda_items.title: Violent Crime Reduction Plan Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the current status of the violent crime reduction plan.

agenda_items.title: Overview of Dallas Police Unmanned Aircraft Systems (UAS) Program
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the UAS program implemented by the Dallas Police Department.

agenda_items.title: Overview of Dallas Fire-Rescue prevention and Investigation Bureau
agenda_items.description: Presentation on the prevention and investigation efforts of the Dallas Fire-Rescue Department.
agenda_items.presenter: Justin Ball, Tameji Berry, Chris Martinez, Eric Beal

agenda_items.title: Dallas Fire-Rescue Facility Construction Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the construction of Dallas Fire-Rescue facilities.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Fire-Rescue Fleet Maintenance Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the maintenance of the Dallas Fire-Rescue fleet.

agenda_items.title: Annual Warrant Resolution 2025
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the annual warrant resolution.

agenda_items.title: Crisis Intervention Team Expansion Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the expansion of the crisis intervention team.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Marshal’s Office 2024 Racial Profiling Report
agenda_items.description: Presentation of the racial profiling report from the Dallas Marshal's Office.

agenda_items.title: Marshal’s Homeless Action Response Team Activity Report
agenda_items.description: Report on the activities of the Marshal's Homeless Action Response Team.

agenda_items.title: 2025 Meet & Confer Agreement
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the meet and confer agreement for 2025.

financial_items.description: Annual payment for fire drills and specialized training
Purchase of utility terrain vehicles for the police department
Master agreement for fire hoses purchase
Service contract for helicopter pilot training
Master agreement for kitchen and cafeteria supplies
